BladePy v0.1

#############

11/04/2017 release

- Fixed (?) button in input writer window.
- Fixed transformation of parts in output viewer window.

- Modified number of digits for modify_te command.
- Modified MP x Beta tecplot to S x Beta, if "S" coordinate exists and is not a list of only zeros.

- Added functionality of toggling visibility of blade profiles or mean lines in MP x TH tecplot
